CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI and INV enter the room . MOT carries CHI into the room then lets her down . CHI plays with football . INV explains Warm-Up to MOT
<bef> MOT throws football up in the air . MOT catches football
MOT holds football out to CHI
<bef> CHI takes football from MOT . CHI holds football up over her head
CHI steps towards MOT then throws the football at her
the football bounces off MOT then falls to the floor
<aft> MOT reaches for football then stops

INV explains PCI Activities to MOT then leaves the room
MOT takes ball down from desk
CHI stands over by the desk looking up at MOT with the bottle in her mouth

CHI has bottle in her mouth throughout most of PCI Activities

MOT throws ball up in the air and catches it twice
CHI continues to suck on bottle lifting it up in the air and tilting her head back
MOT puts ball on the floor and rolls it to CHI
MOT leans over and grabs the ball as it is about to hit CHI's feet
CHI turns around in a circle
MOT grabs ball as it touches CHI's feet and then places it on the sitting block next to CHI
MOT puts ball back on block
camera makes noise as it moves
